title: Set-ConsoleSettings colors definition scheme
description: Colors used for the Set-ConsoleConfiguration cmdlet (https://github.com/lperezperez/Set-ConsoleSettings).

ColorTable00.title: Black color
ColorTable00.description: Specifies the hex color value for Black color (ConsoleColor: Black, CMD: Black, ANSI: Black).

ColorTable01.title: Dark-blue color
ColorTable01.description: Specifies the hex color value for Dark-blue color (ConsoleColor: DarkBlue, CMD: Blue, ANSI: Blue).

ColorTable02.title: Dark-green color
ColorTable02.description: Specifies the hex color value for Dark-green color (ConsoleColor: DarkGreen, CMD: Green, ANSI: Green).

ColorTable03.title: Dark-cyan color
ColorTable03.description: Specifies the hex color value for Dark-cyan color (ConsoleColor: DarkCyan, CMD: Aqua, ANSI: Cyan).

ColorTable04.title: Dark-red color
ColorTable04.description: Specifies the hex color value for Dark-red color (ConsoleColor: DarkRed, CMD: Red, ANSI: Red).

ColorTable05.title: Dark-magenta color
ColorTable05.description: Specifies the hex color value for Dark-magenta color (ConsoleColor: DarkMagenta, CMD: Purple, ANSI: Magenta).

ColorTable06.title: Dark-yellow color
ColorTable06.description: Specifies the hex color value for Dark-yellow color (ConsoleColor: DarkYellow, CMD: Yellow, ANSI: Yellow).

ColorTable07.title: Gray color
ColorTable07.description: Specifies the hex color value for Gray color (ConsoleColor: Gray, CMD: White, ANSI: White).

ColorTable08.title: Dark-gray color
ColorTable08.description: Specifies the hex color value for Dark-gray color (ConsoleColor: DarkGray, CMD: Gray, ANSI: Bright Black).

ColorTable09.title: Blue color
ColorTable09.description: Specifies the hex color value for Blue color (ConsoleColor: Blue, CMD: Light Blue, ANSI: Bright Blue).

ColorTable10.title: Green color
ColorTable10.description: Specifies the hex color value for Green color (ConsoleColor: Green, CMD: Light Green, ANSI: Bright Green).

ColorTable11.title: Cyan color
ColorTable11.description: Specifies the hex color value for Cyan color (ConsoleColor: Cyan, CMD: Light Aqua, ANSI: Bright Cyan).

ColorTable12.title: Red color
ColorTable12.description: Specifies the hex color value for Red color (ConsoleColor: Red, CMD: Light Red, ANSI: Bright Red).

ColorTable13.title: Magenta color
ColorTable13.description: Specifies the hex color value for Magenta color (ConsoleColor: Magenta, CMD: Light Purple, ANSI: Bright Magenta).

ColorTable14.title: Yellow
ColorTable14.description: Specifies the hex color value for Yellow color (ConsoleColor: Yellow, CMD: Light Yellow, ANSI: Bright Yellow).

ColorTable15.title: White
ColorTable15.description: Specifies the hex color value for White color (ConsoleColor: White, CMD: Bright White, ANSI: Bright White).
